page.shortlink: api client api a5 buttonlist setdisplay method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the button to set the display state of the button list.

argument.name: display
argument.description: The display state of the specified button in the button list.

page.description: Set the display state of a button in the button list.
page.example: // assume "colorsBtnList" is an A5.ButtonList colorsBtnList.setDisplay('green',true); // "green" is no longer visible
